title: BRUTAL SIEGE BATTLE - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay
description:
Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Gameplay - This is a brutal siege battle on the Medieval Mod for Total War Attila.  It is a 3v3 and it comes to a very bloody conclusion.  Enjoy the Battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
